channel.title: Rune-Zone Development [Updated!]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]My Development![/size]
If you would like to join a development team take a look at... [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456672.msg3342247.html#msg3342247]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456672.msg3342247.html#msg3342247[/url]
This is my development, it is the latest Exion Source and Client.
This is what I have done, please don't flame me or post negative comments. This is my second creation of life and it is still in development. I had 13 friends of mine check it out and they most certainly enjoyed it.
Completed, Processing, Unfinished!
- New Home. - New Premium Area. - Added Premium Shop(s). - Removed Teleports. - Farming Fixed! - Mage Of Zamorak is your transportation. [Added Everywhere] - Vampire takes you to slayer tower. - Sailor takes you to God Wars. [Will be reconstructed in a new area, dividing both NPC's] - Added/Removed Commands! - Added Spawning Rights To Character Files! [0, 1] I get to choose who spawns Regular Players, Members, Staff! :P - Fixing Dupes [Arrow/Trade and Alchemy] - Npc/Player Clipping
[size=12pt][i][b]Rune-Zone Points![/b][/i][/size]
ISP is obtained by killing NPC's, All NPC's are everywhere. The higher the level the more points. When you are even training your combat on the monster you get ISP Per Level Trained. Isp is a great way to get great items, it isn't that hard and it isn't that easy. All it takes is dedication, and As well ISP is included per skill level.
More updates will be added!
[i][b]I give credits to Exion for releasing the source. I am publishing what I have done and changed. Exion if you see this I would like you to logg in and check it out for yourself as well! :) [/b][/i] [b] Pictures![/b]
Home! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2mfkyee.png[/img]
Premium! [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/5djm15.png[/img]
Npc Dialogue/Player Teleport! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/wsr9k6.png[/img]
Lunar Spells Tab! [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9762/lunar.png[/img]
Vengeance Emote [Just Missing Skull] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/oj2d08.png[/img]
ISP Shop/Prices! [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/23abro.png[/img]
Level 4 Wild Instantly [Edgeville] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2jaf9fl.png[/img]
Pking [MB] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/33x7ksp.png[/img]
Those are just a few pictures of what has been done, still lots of things to be done. I hope you enjoyed the development thread and I hope you pray and wish me luck!
Thank you for taking your time, to preview this thread.

item.title: Rune-Zone Development [Updated!]
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[size=18pt]My Development![/size]

If you would like to join a development team take a look at…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456672.msg3342247.html#msg3342247

This is my development, it is the latest Exion Source and Client.

This is what I have done, please don’t flame me or post negative comments.
This is my second creation of life and it is still in development. I had 13 friends of mine check it out and they most certainly enjoyed it.

Completed, Processing, Unfinished!

  • New Home.
  • New Premium Area.
  • Added Premium Shop(s).
  • Removed Teleports.
  • Farming Fixed!
  • Mage Of Zamorak is your transportation. [Added Everywhere]
  • Vampire takes you to slayer tower.
  • Sailor takes you to God Wars. [Will be reconstructed in a new area, dividing both NPC’s]
  • Added/Removed Commands!
  • Added Spawning Rights To Character Files! [0, 1] I get to choose who spawns Regular Players, Members, Staff!
  • Fixing Dupes [Arrow/Trade and Alchemy]
  • Npc/Player Clipping

[size=12pt]Rune-Zone Points![/size]

ISP is obtained by killing NPC’s, All NPC’s are everywhere. The higher the level the more points. When you are even training your combat on the monster you get ISP Per Level Trained. Isp is a great way to get great items, it isn’t that hard and it isn’t that easy. All it takes is dedication, and As well ISP is included per skill level.

More updates will be added!

I give credits to Exion for releasing the source. I am publishing what I have done and changed. Exion if you see this I would like you to logg in and check it out for yourself as well!


Pictures!

Home!

Premium!

Npc Dialogue/Player Teleport!

Lunar Spells Tab!

Vengeance Emote [Just Missing Skull]

ISP Shop/Prices!

Level 4 Wild Instantly [Edgeville]

Pking [MB]

Those are just a few pictures of what has been done, still lots of things to be done. I hope you enjoyed the development thread and I hope you pray and wish me luck!

Thank you for taking your time, to preview this thread.
